Short_Description:
Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 Core i7 13th Gen RTX 4050 6GB Graphics 16" 165Hz Gaming Laptop
The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 Gaming Laptop is a powerful gaming laptop that can handle any game. It features a 13th-generation Intel Core i7 CPU with 14 cores and 20 threads that can accelerate to 4.7 GHz on the performance cores and 3.5 GHz on the efficiency cores. It also boasts a 16-inch WUXGA display with a refresh rate of 165 Hz and a reaction time of 3 ms, allowing for smooth and responsive gameplay. The laptop also has an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 graphics card with 6 GB of VRAM that supports DLSS 3, NVIDIA Reflex, PCI Express Gen 4, Resizable BAR, NVIDIA GPU Boost, Vulkan 4.6, 5th Generation NVIDIA Decoder, and DirectX 12 Ultimate. The laptop also contains 16 GB of DDR5 RAM that operates at 4800 MHz and can be expanded to 64 GB, as well as a 512 GB PCIe NVMe Gen 4 SSD for rapid booting, loading, and data transfer. The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 Core i7 13th Gen RTX 4050 6GB Graphics 16" 165Hz Gaming Laptop comes with a 90 Wh battery that can last up to 8 hours and can be charged quickly. A FineTip RGB-backlit keyboard with a Mode Key and a multi-gesture touchpad with Microsoft Precision Touchpad certification are also featured. The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 165Hz Gaming Laptop features a narrow USB HD camera with Temporal Noise Reduction as well as a twin microphone system. For connectivity, the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 Core i7 13th Gen RTX 4050 6GB Graphics 16" 165Hz Gaming Laptop has USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports, USB Type-C connectors with Thunderbolt 4 compatibility, an HDMI connector, and an Ethernet port.
165Hz Refresh Rate
The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 has a stunning 16-inch WUXGA display with a 1920 x 1200 pixel resolution. The display boasts a refresh rate of 165 Hz and a reaction time of 3 ms, ensuring smooth and responsive gameplay with minimum motion blur and ghosting. The display also features 400 nits of brightness, a 100% sRGB color gamut, and a 170-degree wide viewing angle, so you can see vibrant and true colors from any angle. The display is compatible with Nvidia Advanced Optimus, which intelligently switches between integrated and discrete graphics cards based on workload, conserving battery life and enhancing performance.
Great Battery Backup
The 90 Wh 4-cell Li-ion battery in the Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 delivers long-lasting power for your gaming sessions. Depending on the settings and effort, the battery can last up to 8 hours on average. The battery also enables rapid charging, with a charge time of up to 30 minutes.
Ports and Connectivity
The Acer Predator Helios Neo 16 PHN16-71 has many kinds of ports for connecting your devices and peripherals, including USB 3.2 Gen 2 ports that can transfer data at up to 10 Gbps and charge your devices, USB Type-C ports that support Thunderbolt 4 technology and can transfer data at up to 40 Gbps and support various features, an HDMI port that can output video and audio to an external monitor or TV, and an Ethernet port that can connect to a wired network for faster and more stable internet connectivity.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch Retina Display M2 Chip 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Space Gray (MNEJ3)
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch laptop is powered by the new M2 chip. It comes with the same compact design but now it supports up to 20 hours of battery life and an active cooling system to sustain enhanced performance. It is loaded with 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD. The MacBook Pro features a brilliant Retina display, a FaceTime HD camera, and studio‑quality mics. macOS and M2 work together to bring more speed and responsiveness to all your go‑to apps. The Apple MacBook Pro comes with active cooling that sustains blazing‑fast performance.
Level up with the New M2 Chip
The Apple M2 chip is an 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. It comes with 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, and 100GB/s memory bandwidth for superfluid multitasking and working with massive files. It features over 20 billion transistors - 25 percent more than M1. And its 16-core Neural Engine is capable of executing up to 15.8 trillion operations per second to accelerate machine learning tasks. The high-performance media engine on M2 supports ProRes encode and decode. So you can play and edit up to 11 streams of 4K ProRes video and up to 2 streams of 8K ProRes video.
Retina display supports millions of colors
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch comes with a brilliant 13.3-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2560-by-1600 native resolution at 227 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors. The bright LED backlighting delivers deep blacks and bright whites. It features 500 nits brightness, Wide color (P3), and True Tone technology.
Camera and mics
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch is equipped with a FaceTime HD camera and a Three-mic array. Thanks to the advanced image signal processor on M2, you’ll look your best on video calls. The microphones deliver an improved signal‑to‑noise ratio that rivals that of professional‑grade microphones.
Magic Keyboard and the Touch Bar
The Apple MacBook Pro comes with a Magic Keyboard that delivers a comfortable, quiet, and responsive typing experience. The Touch Bar puts the commands you need most right where you need them, saving time and keystrokes. You can do all kinds of things quicker with handy shortcuts and features. And Touch ID provides fast, easy authentication for secure logins and purchases.
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch comes with a 1-year International Limited Warranty (Terms & Condition Apply As Per Apple)

Short_Description:
ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA-M3031W Core i7 12th Gen 14.5" 2.8K Touch Laptop
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is a high-performance laptop featuring a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and an OLED display. The laptop features a dual-screen design, with a 14-inch OLED touchscreen primary display and a 12.6-inch touchscreen secondary display, which can be used for multi-tasking or as a virtual keyboard and touchpad. The OLED display offers deep blacks and vibrant colors, making it ideal for video and photo editing, and other creative tasks. Other notable features include a lightweight and slim design, fast storage and memory, and a full-size backlit keyboard. It's a perfect choice for professionals and power users who demand the best in performance and display quality.
Powerful Processor and Performance
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is powered by an Intel Core i7-12700H Processor with a base clock speed of 2.3 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz. The processor has 6 physical cores and 8 threads. This laptop comes with Intel Iris Xe graphics. This Core i7 Laptop comes with 16GB of LPDDR5 memory on board. It also comes with 1TB of M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 Performance SSD storage. The Laptop does not have any expansion slots or the capability to upgrade the memory.
Experience the Vibrant and Immersive Display
ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA has a 14.5-inch OLED touchscreen display with a resolution of 2.8K (2880 x 1800) and an aspect ratio of 16:10. The display has a 0.2ms response time and a 120Hz refresh rate, which allows for smooth and fluid visuals. The display of this OLED Laptop is also VESA CERTIFIED Display HDR True Black 500 which means it has a peak brightness of 550 nits and a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1, providing a high dynamic range viewing experience. The color gamut of the display is 100% DCI-P3, which means it can display a wide range of colors. The display is also PANTONE Validated, ensuring accurate and consistent color reproduction. The display has a screen-to-body ratio of 93%. It also has a low blue light feature which reduces the amount of harmful blue light by 70% and SGS Eye Care Display. ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA features a ScreenPad Plus, a 12.7-inch IPS-level panel with a resolution of 2880 x 864 that supports stylus input.
Connectivity and Security
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA comes equipped with a 720p HD front-facing camera for video conferencing and streaming. It also comes with onboard wireless connectivity options, including Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.0. In terms of I/O ports, this laptop includes 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports that support display and power delivery, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, 1x DC-in, and a Micro SD Express 7.1 card reader for easy data transfer and storage expansion.
High-quality Audio
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is equipped with advanced audio features, including Smart Amp technology that enhances the performance of the built-in speakers, as well as a built-in array microphone that enables clear communication during video calls and recordings. The Laptop also features premium Harman/Kardon speakers for an immersive audio experience. Additionally, it has support for voice control through Cortana and Alexa, which allow users to control the device and access information using voice commands.
Design and Durability
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZA is powered by a 76WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion battery and comes with a ø6.0, 150W AC adapter with an output of 20V DC, 9A and 150W. The input voltage is 100~240V AC and 50/60Hz, making it a universal adapter. This Premium Laptop has a backlit chiclet keyboard. The LCD cover is made of aluminum and is in Tech Black color. The top case is made of Magnesium-Aluminum Alloy and is also in Tech Black color. It is built to meet US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standards, ensuring its durability and resistance to extreme conditions.

Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 GA402RJ Ryzen 9 6900HS RX 6700S 8GB Graphics 14" WQXGA Gaming Laptop
The Asus ROG Zephyrus G14 GA402RJ Laptop is powered by AMD and Windows 11 out of the box. Featuring new Ryzen 9 processors and Radeon RX 6800S mobile graphics, this all-AMD powerhouse is ready for any gaming or multitasking you can throw at it. The G14 also leverages AMD technologies like Smartshift and Smart Access Memory for an extra edge. AMD Smartshift allows the CPU and GPU to dynamically allocate power when and where it is needed the most, and AMD Smart Access Memory gives the CPU full access to the GPU’s full VRAM, improving performance in games. Your laptop’s display is the window to everything you do on the machine. This year we are upping the ante with a massive 91% screen-to-body ratio 16:10 display. Our QHD 120Hz model also fulfills the ROG Nebula display standard, with 100% DCI-P3 coverage, Pantone validation, 500 nit brightness with a response time of just 3ms. This nearly bezel-less display is about as immersive as you can get on a laptop. Virtual 5.1.2-channel surround sound powered by Dolby Atmos technology puts you in the center of the action, with a volume 1.78x louder than the previous generation G14. Twin tweeters fire sound directly at you, while dual Smart Amp woofers bounce sound off the table underneath the machine. Switch between 6 preset modes that optimize settings based on the type of game and media, or make manual modifications that fit your preferences. Two-Way AI Noise Cancelation filters both input and output audio, making streams, chats, and recording clearer than ever. Dual USB Type-C ports, one with power delivery and DisplayPort 1.4 support, as well as a pair of USB 3.2 Type-A ports provide ample connectivity options. The brand-new addition of a Micro SD card reader is perfect for creators who need to transfer data while on the move. Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M2 Pro 16GB RAM 512GB SSD Space Gray (MPHE3LL/A, MPHE3ZP/A)
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M2 Pro features the Apple M.2 Pro 10-Core Chip, which provides the power and performance needed to handle your professional workflows. The 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display features a 3024-by-1964 resolution, 1000 cd/m² of sustained brightness, 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, P3 color gamut support, and more. With up to 16GB of Unified RAM and 512GB of SSD storage, you'll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere.
Apple M2 Pro 10-Core CPU
Apple M2 Pro delivers the performance you need without sacrificing power efficiency. The 10-Core CPU features eight performance cores and four high-efficiency cores. The 16-Core Neural Engine provides support for on-device machine learning acceleration and improved camera performance. The M2 Pro offers up to 200 GB/s of memory bandwidth as well as support for up to 32GB of unified memory. The efficient architecture of M2 Pro means they deliver the same level of performance whether MacBook Pro is plugged in or using the battery.
14.2" Liquid Retina XDR Display
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch Laptop comes with a 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display. Delivering up to 1000 cd/m² of sustained, full-screen brightness, a high 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, and a billion colors, the Liquid Retina XDR display can handle the extreme dynamic range of HDR content, providing detailed shadows, brilliant specular highlights, deeper blacks, and vivid colors.
Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD Camera
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch comes with a Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD camera, the MacBook Pro uses the ISP and Neural Engine in M2 Pro and M2 Max for a computational video that enhances video quality.
Spatial Sound Speakers and Better Mics
The Apple MacBook Pro features a high-fidelity, six-speaker sound system, which has two tweeters for a clearer soundstage as well as four force-canceling woofers, resulting in 80 percent more bass. The sound system also supports spatial audio, providing a three-dimensional audio experience, whether you're listening to music or watching a movie in Dolby Atmos. Apple also has studio microphones that have a lower noise floor, resulting in clear calls as well as voice recordings.
Backlit Magic Keyboard with Touch ID
The latest 14.2-inch Apple MacBook Pro comes with a Magic Keyboard that features a 78-key US layout, including 12 full-height function keys and four arrow keys in an inverted-T arrangement. It is also backlit with an ambient light sensor. It also has a Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities.
Networking and Connectivity
The Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch features Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) for faster wireless connectivity. It also comes with Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port, an SDXC card slot, a headphone jack, MagSafe 3 port. The HDMI output supports 8K displays at 60 HZ and 4K displays at 240 Hz. MagSafe 3 makes connecting a power cable quick and easy while also protecting your MacBook Pro. Apple also brings fast charging to the MacBook Pro, allowing you to charge up to 50 percent in just 30 minutes.

Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen RTX 3060 6GB Graphics 15.6" FHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop
The Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen Gaming Laptop is a high-performance gaming laptop designed for gamers and power users. It is equipped with the latest 12th generation Intel Core i7-12700H processor, offering exceptional processing power and efficiency. With a base clock speed of 3.5GHz and a turbo boost frequency of 4.7GHz, this 14-core, 20-thread processor ensures smooth multitasking and impressive performance. To enhance the gaming experience, the laptop features a powerful NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 graphics card with 6GB of dedicated DDR6 memory. This graphics card provides stunning visuals and supports the latest gaming technologies, allowing for smooth gameplay and realistic graphics. The laptop comes with 16GB of DDR5-4800 RAM, offering fast and responsive performance for demanding tasks and gaming. Additionally, it is equipped with a spacious 1TB SSD M.2 NVME storage, providing ample space for storing games, files, and multimedia content while ensuring quick load times. The Lenovo Legion 5i features a 15.6-inch Full HD IPS display with a refresh rate of 144Hz, delivering smooth and immersive visuals. The anti-glare coating helps reduce eye strain, allowing for comfortable extended gaming sessions. The built-in 1080p FHD camera with an electronic shutter enables high-quality video calls and streaming. Audio is also a priority in this laptop, as it comes with 2Wx2 Nahimic audio, providing clear and immersive sound for an enhanced gaming experience. The 4-zone RGB backlit keyboard adds a stylish and customizable touch to the laptop, allowing users to personalize their gaming setup. The laptop offers versatile options with DP1.4, Thunderbolt 4, and HDMI 8K/60Hz ports, enabling seamless connection to external displays and peripherals. It also features WiFi 6E technology for fast and reliable wireless internet connectivity, along with Bluetooth 5.1 for wireless device pairing. The laptop is equipped with TPM 2.0 (Trusted Platform Module) for enhanced security, ensuring the protection of sensitive data and system integrity. With its powerful hardware and advanced features, the Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen Gaming Laptop is a top choice for gamers and performance enthusiasts looking for a high-end gaming experience.

Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen RTX 3070 8GB Graphics 15.6" 2.5K 165Hz Gaming Laptop
The Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen Gaming Laptop is a powerful gaming laptop that offers impressive specifications and features for an immersive gaming experience. Powered by the 12th generation Intel Core i7-12700H processor, this laptop provides high performance with a base clock speed of 3.5GHz and a boost clock speed of up to 4.7GHz. It has 14 cores and 20 threads, making it capable of handling demanding tasks efficiently. The laptop is equipped with 16GB DDR5-4800 RAM, ensuring smooth multitasking and faster data processing. It also features a 512GB M.2 NVME SSD for fast storage and quick boot times. For visual excellence, the Lenovo Legion 5i boasts a 15.6-inch WQHD (2.5K) IPS display with a refresh rate of 165Hz. This high-resolution display provides crisp and detailed visuals, while the Dolby Vision and G-SYNC technologies enhance color accuracy and eliminate screen tearing during gaming sessions. Gaming performance is further enhanced by the inclusion of an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 graphics card with 8GB of DDR6 VRAM. This powerful GPU allows for smooth gameplay and enables ray tracing for realistic lighting and reflections in supported games. The laptop features a 1080p FHD webcam with an electronic shutter for privacy when not in use. The audio is delivered through the 2Wx2 Nahimic audio system, providing immersive sound quality for an enhanced gaming experience. The Lenovo Legion 5i offers multiple options. It includes Thunderbolt 4 (TB4), HDMI 8K/60Hz, and DisplayPort 1.4 ports for connecting to external displays and accessories. It also supports WiFi 6 and Bluetooth 5.1 for fast and reliable wireless connectivity. The laptop comes with a pre-installed one-year licensed version of Microsoft Office (Home & Student 2021), providing productivity tools for work and school tasks. The laptop features a white backlit keyboard for easy typing in low-light conditions. It also includes TPM 2.0 (Trusted Platform Module) for enhanced hardware-based security. The Lenovo Legion 5i Core i7 12th Gen Gaming Laptop offers a powerful combination of processing power, graphics capabilities, high-resolution display, and immersive audio, making it an excellent choice for gamers and power users alike.

ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE-M3050W Core i7 12th Gen RTX 3050 Ti 4GB Graphics 14.5" 2.8K Touch Laptop
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is a high-performance laptop featuring a 12th Gen Intel Core i7 processor and an OLED display. The laptop features a dual-screen design, with a 14-inch OLED touchscreen primary display and a 12.6-inch touchscreen secondary display, which can be used for multi-tasking or as a virtual keyboard and touchpad. The OLED display offers deep blacks and vibrant colors, making it ideal for video and photo editing, and other creative tasks. Other notable features include a lightweight and slim design, fast storage and memory, and a full-size backlit keyboard. It's a perfect choice for professionals and power users who demand the best in performance and display quality.
Powerful Processor and Graphics Capabilities
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is powered by an Intel Core i7-12700H Processor with a base clock speed of 2.3 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz. The processor has 6 physical cores and 8 threads. This laptop comes with NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050 Ti Laptop GPU with 4GB of GDDR6 VRAM. It also features Intel Iris Xe graphics. This Core i7 Laptop comes with 16GB of LPDDR5 memory on board. It also comes with 512GB of M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 Performance SSD storage. The Laptop does not have any expansion slots or the capability to upgrade the memory.
Experience the Vibrant and Immersive Display
ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE has a 14.5-inch OLED touchscreen display with a resolution of 2.8K (2880 x 1800) and an aspect ratio of 16:10. The display has a 0.2ms response time and a 120Hz refresh rate, which allows for smooth and fluid visuals. The display of this OLED Laptop is also VESA CERTIFIED Display HDR True Black 500 which means it has a peak brightness of 550 nits and a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1, providing a high dynamic range viewing experience. The color gamut of the display is 100% DCI-P3, which means it can display a wide range of colors. The display is also PANTONE Validated, ensuring accurate and consistent color reproduction. The display has a screen-to-body ratio of 93%. It also has a low blue light feature which reduces the amount of harmful blue light by 70% and SGS Eye Care Display. ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE features a ScreenPad Plus, a 12.7-inch IPS-level panel with a resolution of 2880 x 864 that supports stylus input.
Connectivity and Security
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE comes equipped with a 720p HD front-facing camera for video conferencing and streaming. It also comes with onboard wireless connectivity options, including Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) and Bluetooth 5.0. In terms of I/O ports, this laptop includes 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports that support display and power delivery, 1x HDMI 2.1, 1x 3.5mm combo audio jack, 1x DC-in, and a Micro SD Express 7.1 card reader for easy data transfer and storage expansion.
High-quality Audio
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is equipped with advanced audio features, including Smart Amp technology that enhances the performance of the built-in speakers, as well as a built-in array microphone that enables clear communication during video calls and recordings. The Laptop also features premium Harman/Kardon speakers for an immersive audio experience. Additionally, it has support for voice control through Cortana and Alexa, which allow users to control the device and access information using voice commands.
Design and Durability
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 14 Duo OLED UX8402ZE is powered by a 76WHrs, 4S1P, 4-cell Li-ion battery and comes with a ø6.0, 180W AC adapter with an output of 20V DC, 9A and 180W. The input voltage is 100~240V AC and 50/60Hz, making it a universal adapter. This Premium Laptop has a backlit chiclet keyboard. The LCD cover is made of aluminum and is in Tech Black color. The top case is made of Magnesium-Aluminum Alloy and is also in Tech Black color. It is built to meet US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standards, ensuring its durability and resistance to extreme conditions.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch M2 Pro 16GB RAM 1TB SSD Space Gray (MNW93)
Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch M2 Pro features the Apple M.2 Pro 12-Core Chip, which provides the power and performance needed to handle your professional workflows. The 16.2" Liquid Retina XDR display features a 3456 x 2234 resolution, 1000 cd/m² of sustained brightness, 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, P3 color gamut support, and more. With up to 16GB of Unified RAM and 1TB of SSD storage, you'll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere.
Apple M2 Pro 12-Core CPU
Apple M2 Pro delivers the performance you need without sacrificing power efficiency. The 12-Core CPU features eight performance cores and four high-efficiency cores. The 16-Core Neural Engine provides support for on-device machine learning acceleration and improved camera performance. The M2 Pro offers up to 200 GB/s of memory bandwidth as well as support for up to 32GB of unified memory. The efficient architecture of M2 Pro means they deliver the same level of performance whether MacBook Pro is plugged in or using the battery.
16.2" Liquid Retina XDR Display
Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch Laptop comes with a 16.2" Liquid Retina XDR display. Delivering up to 1000 cd/m² of sustained, full-screen brightness, a high 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, and a billion colors, the Liquid Retina XDR display can handle the extreme dynamic range of HDR content, providing detailed shadows, brilliant specular highlights, deeper blacks, and vivid colors.
Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD Camera
Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch comes with a Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD camera, the MacBook Pro uses the ISP and Neural Engine in M2 Pro and M2 Max for a computational video that enhances video quality.
Spatial Sound Speakers and Better Mics
The Apple MacBook Pro features a high-fidelity, six-speaker sound system, which has two tweeters for a clearer soundstage as well as four force-canceling woofers, resulting in 80 percent more bass. The sound system also supports spatial audio, providing a three-dimensional audio experience, whether you're listening to music or watching a movie in Dolby Atmos. Apple also has studio microphones that have a lower noise floor, resulting in clear calls as well as voice recordings.
Backlit Magic Keyboard with Touch ID
The latest 16.2-inch Apple MacBook Pro comes with a Magic Keyboard that features a 78-key US layout, including 12 full-height function keys and four arrow keys in an inverted-T arrangement. It is also backlit with an ambient light sensor. It also has a Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities.
Networking and Connectivity
The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch features Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) for faster wireless connectivity. It also comes with Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port, an SDXC card slot, a headphone jack, MagSafe 3 port. The HDMI output supports 8K displays at 60 HZ and 4K displays at 240 Hz. MagSafe 3 makes connecting a power cable quick and easy while also protecting your MacBook Pro. Apple also brings fast charging to the MacBook Pro, allowing you to charge up to 50 percent in just 30 minutes.

Asus ROG Strix SCAR 17 G733ZX Core i9 12th Gen RTX 3080 Ti 16GB Graphics 17.3" WQHD Gaming Laptop
The Asus ROG Strix SCAR 17 G733ZX is a pinnacle of gaming laptop engineering, designed to deliver unparalleled performance and immersive gaming experiences. With a potent blend of cutting-edge components and advanced features, this laptop is poised to redefine your gaming encounters. Whether you're battling in intense online multiplayer matches or diving into the captivating worlds of single-player epics, the ROG Strix SCAR 17 G733ZX is your gateway to unbridled gaming prowess. Powering the laptop's lightning-fast performance is the Intel Core i9-12900H, a 12th-generation processor boasting an impressive 24MB cache. With a base clock speed of 2.50 GHz, this processor can turbo boost up to 5.00 GHz, effortlessly handling the most demanding tasks and ensuring fluid gameplay. A substantial 32GB of DDR5 RAM ensures that multitasking, resource-intensive applications, and gaming performance remain uncompromised, providing smooth responsiveness and minimizing lag. With a spacious 1TB SSD (Solid State Drive), the laptop offers rapid data access speeds, enabling quick game loading times, fast file transfers, and seamless overall system performance. The laptop's visual prowess is spearheaded by the formidable NVIDIA RTX 3080 Ti with 16GB of GDDR6 VRAM. This powerhouse graphics card delivers stunning visuals, fluid frame rates, and real-time ray tracing for lifelike lighting and reflections, all contributing to an immersive gaming environment. The expansive 17.3-inch WQHD (Wide Quad High Definition) display enhances your gaming and media experiences with sharp details and vibrant colors, while the high resolution ensures visual clarity and depth. The 1-Zone RGB backlit chiclet keyboard is not only visually striking but also functional, offering customizable lighting effects and comfortable key travel, making long gaming sessions more enjoyable.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M2 Pro 16GB RAM 1TB SSD Space Gray (MPHF3)
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch M2 Pro features the Apple M.2 Pro 12-Core Chip, which provides the power and performance needed to handle your professional workflows. The 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display features a 3024-by-1964 resolution, 1000 cd/m² of sustained brightness, 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, P3 color gamut support, and more. With up to 16GB of Unified RAM and 1TB of SSD storage, you'll be able to load massive files and launch apps quickly, enabling you to work with photo and video libraries from almost anywhere.
Apple M2 Pro 12-Core CPU
Apple M2 Pro delivers the performance you need without sacrificing power efficiency. The 12-Core CPU features eight performance cores and four high-efficiency cores. The 16-Core Neural Engine provides support for on-device machine learning acceleration and improved camera performance. The M2 Pro offers up to 200 GB/s of memory bandwidth as well as support for up to 32GB of unified memory. The efficient architecture of M2 Pro means they deliver the same level of performance whether MacBook Pro is plugged in or using the battery.
14.2" Liquid Retina XDR Display
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch Laptop comes with a 14.2" Liquid Retina XDR display. Delivering up to 1000 cd/m² of sustained, full-screen brightness, a high 1600 cd/m² of peak brightness, a 1,000,000:1 contrast ratio, and a billion colors, the Liquid Retina XDR display can handle the extreme dynamic range of HDR content, providing detailed shadows, brilliant specular highlights, deeper blacks, and vivid colors.
Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD Camera
Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch comes with a Full HD 1080p FaceTime HD camera, the MacBook Pro uses the ISP and Neural Engine in M2 Pro and M2 Max for a computational video that enhances video quality.
Spatial Sound Speakers and Better Mics
The Apple MacBook Pro features a high-fidelity, six-speaker sound system, which has two tweeters for a clearer soundstage as well as four force-canceling woofers, resulting in 80 percent more bass. The sound system also supports spatial audio, providing a three-dimensional audio experience, whether you're listening to music or watching a movie in Dolby Atmos. Apple also has studio microphones that have a lower noise floor, resulting in clear calls as well as voice recordings.
Backlit Magic Keyboard with Touch ID
The latest 14.2-inch Apple MacBook Pro comes with a Magic Keyboard that features a 78-key US layout, including 12 full-height function keys and four arrow keys in an inverted-T arrangement. It is also backlit with an ambient light sensor. It also has a Force Touch trackpad for precise cursor control and pressure-sensing capabilities.
Networking and Connectivity
The Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch features Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) for faster wireless connectivity. It also comes with Three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port, an SDXC card slot, a headphone jack, MagSafe 3 port. The HDMI output supports 8K displays at 60 HZ and 4K displays at 240 Hz. MagSafe 3 makes connecting a power cable quick and easy while also protecting your MacBook Pro. Apple also brings fast charging to the MacBook Pro, allowing you to charge up to 50 percent in just 30 minutes.

ASUS ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED W7600H3A Core i7 11th Gen RTX A3000 6GB Graphics 16" OLED Laptop
The ASUS ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED W7600H3A Laptop Improve Your Work Experience With ASUS's 16" ProArt StudioBook Pro W7600H3A. The ProArt StudioBook Pro W7600H3A optimizes workflow in creative and unique ways thanks to its OLED displays. The resolution of the main 16-inch display is 3840 x 2400. The ProArt StudioBook Pro W7600H3A has a 2.3 GHz Intel Core I7-11800H processor (24M caches, up to 4.6 GHz, 8 cores), 32GB of DDR4 RAM, and a 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe solid-state drive to provide improved system performance, suitable for a variety of graphic design programs. The NVIDIA RTX A3000 Laptop GPU, with a boost up to 1560MHz at 90W (105W with Dynamic Boost), 6GB GDDR6, enables vivid colors and detailed imagery, which is crucial for designers seeking color accuracy. A variety of Thunderbolt 4 ports are also included on the ProArt StudioBook Pro W7600H3A for faster data transfers with external drives and multi-display support.
16-inch 4K OLED HDR 16:10 Display
Your creations need the best possible visuals, and ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED provides that with a 4K OLED HDR6 display that is unparalleled in its class. With a 100% DCI-P3 Industry-Standard Color Gamut, You're Guaranteed To See As Many Vivid, True-To-Life Colors As Possible On This Display, Which Delivers Truly Photorealistic Visuals With Ultra-High Contrast And Deep Blacks That Are VESA DisplayHDR 500 True Black Certified. This remarkable display has a Delta-E color accuracy value of less than 27, is PANTONE validated, and has been Calman verified for delivering precise color accuracy. ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED Is Also Less Taxing On Your Eyes For Those Protracted Late-Night Sessions, With 70% Lower Blue-Light Emissions Compared To LCD Models, And It's Certified For Eye Care By TÜV Rheinland.
Performance For Professionals
The ASUS ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED W7600H3A Laptop is Designed With One Goal In Mind: To Give You All The Raw Performance You Need To Handle Even The Toughest, Most Resource-Hungry Projects. It’s Equipped With Up To A Mighty Intel Core I7-11800H 2.3 GHz (24M Cache, Up To 4.6 GHz, 8 Cores) Processor, Professional-Grade NVIDIA RTX A3000 Graphics, One Of The World’s Fastest SSDs, And Has A Flexible Memory Configuration With A Massive 32 GB Of High-Speed RAM. It’s The Ultimate Professional Laptop, Built For The Ultimate Professional.
Fast Graphics, Stable Drivers
The ASUS ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED W7600H3A laptop's NVIDIA RTX A3000 laptop GPU, based on NVIDIA Ampere Architecture and the second generation of RTX technology, offers professional-level 3D graphics processing capabilities. The GPU's cutting-edge capabilities, including Ray Tracing, AI Acceleration, and quick GDDR6 video memory, as well as its ability to boost GPU power from 80 W to 110 W, enable it to finish even the most challenging tasks, like complex CAD models, 3D product design, or high-resolution video editing, quickly. To ensure maximum performance, rock-solid reliability, and broad software compatibility for exceptional driver stability, we use NVIDIA Studio drivers.
Make Magic Happen with ASUS Dial
Learn new techniques for working with the newest and most unique You can instantly and precisely manipulate parameters in your creative programs with ASUS Dial, a simple physical controller. You can quickly undo activities, and modify the brush size, saturation, and layer opacity. To improve the efficiency of your creative process, you may also change the screen brightness, loudness, and vertical scroll. To make your creative workflow more efficient, there are more than 70 functions available. Four Adobe applications—Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Lightroom Classic, and After Effects—are currently supported by ASUS Dial. There are more compatible apps on the way, and it is completely customizable!
Connectivity
This Device It is simple to connect the ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED to your studio peripherals, display devices, and networks thanks to the complete array of I/O connections. Your connectivity is miles ahead of the competition thanks to the Thunderbolt 4 USB-C connector, the USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-C port with Power Delivery, DisplayPort, and VR compatibility, the newest HDMI 2.1 port, and an SD Express 7.0 card reader. Additionally, ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED comes with WiFi 6 (802.11ax), allowing for simple connection, creation, and sharing while on the road. The ASUS ProArt Studiobook Pro 16 OLED W7600H3A Core i7 11th Gen 16" OLED Laptop comes with 02 years International Limited Warranty (Battery 1 year).

Short_Description:
ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM-ME132W Core i9 12th Gen RTX 3060 6GB Graphics 16" 4K Touch Laptop
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM is a high-end laptop that features a 16-inch OLED display with a resolution of 3840x2160, which is designed to produce deep blacks and vibrant colors. The ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED is powered by an Intel Core i9-12900H (24M Cache, 2.5 GHz up to 5.0 GHz, 6P+8E cores, and comes with up to 32GB of RAM and 1TB of storage. It also has a dedicated NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 6GB GDDR6 graphics card for improved performance when running graphics-intensive applications. Other notable features include a Backlit Chiclet Keyboard Per-Key RGBW with N-key Rollover, a fingerprint sensor for secure login, and a large touchpad with multi-touch support. The laptop also has a sleek and slim design which is great for portability and also has a long battery life.
Powerful Processor and Graphics Capabilities
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM-ME132W is powered by an Intel Core i9-12900H Processor with a base clock speed of 2.5 GHz and a boost clock speed of up to 5.0 GHz, and has 24M Cache and 6P+8E cores. This ASUS premium laptop has an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Laptop GPU with 6GB of GDDR6 VRAM, which allows for powerful performance when running graphics-intensive applications. It has 32GB LPDDR5 of onboard memory and 1TB of storage in the form of M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 Performance SSD which ensures quick data transfer.
Experience the Vibrant and Immersive Display
The ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM has a 16-inch OLED touchscreen display with a resolution of 4K (3840 x 2400) and an aspect ratio of 16:10. The display has a 0.2ms response time and a 60Hz refresh rate, which allows for smooth and fluid visuals. The display of this OLED Laptop is also VESA CERTIFIED Display HDR True Black 500 which means it has a peak brightness of 550 nits and a contrast ratio of 1,000,000:1, providing a high dynamic range viewing experience. The color gamut of the display is 100% DCI-P3, which means it can display a wide range of colors. The display is also PANTONE Validated, ensuring accurate and consistent color reproduction. The display is glossy and has a screen-to-body ratio of 90%. It also has a low blue light feature which reduces the amount of harmful blue light by 70% and is TÜV Rheinland-certified and SGS Eye Care Display.
Connectivity and Security
ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM comes with a front-facing camera with FHD resolution and an IR function to support Windows Hello. It also has a privacy shutter for added security. The laptop is equipped with Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) (Dual band) 2*2 and Bluetooth 5 for wireless connectivity. It has a built-in fingerprint sensor for secure login and also supports NumberPad. It has various I/O ports including 1x USB 3.2 Gen 2 Type-A, 2x Thunderbolt 4 ports which support display and power delivery, 1x HDMI 2.1 FRL, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in, and SD Express 7.0 card reader.
Make magic happen with ASUS Dial
ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM comes with the redesigned ASUS Dial, an intuitive physical rotary controller that allows you to manipulate parameters in favorite creative programs with the tip of your finger. It's now only 3.2 mm thick, which is 75% thinner than the previous version, and glass-covered for ultra-smooth operation. You may quickly modify the brush size, saturation, layer opacity, and undo actions. You may also change the brightness and loudness of the screen, as well as the vertical scroll, to help your creative workflow run more smoothly. ASUS Dial is entirely customisable and works in Adobe Photoshop, Premiere Pro, Photoshop Lightroom Classic, After Effects, and Illustrator.
High-quality Audio
For audio, the ASUS Zenbook Pro 16X OLED is equipped with Smart Amp Technology, built-in 4-way stereo speakers, and a built-in array microphone. It also features Harman/Kardon (Premium) for high-quality sound. It also has voice-recognition support for Cortana and Alexa.
Design and Durability
Zenbook Pro 16X OLED UX7602ZM has an aluminum body in a Tech Black color. The laptop is built to US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard for durability. This Powerful Core i9 Laptop is powered by a 96WHrs, 3S2P, 6-cell Li-ion battery. It comes with a ø6.0, 200W AC Adapter that has an output of 20V DC, 10A, 200W and an input of 100~240V AC 50/60Hz universal. The Laptop features a backlit chiclet keyboard with per-key RGBW and N-key rollover for an improved typing experience. It has a dimension of 35.50 x 25.10 x 1.69 ~ 1.78 cm and weighs 2.40 kg.

Short_Description:
ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702 Core i7 12th Gen 16GB RAM 1TB SSD 17.3" Touch Display Foled Laptop
The ASUS Zenbook 17 Fold OLED is a revolutionary spin on the conventional laptop, having a 17.3" foldable screen. This laptop sports a Foldable OLED display with a 4:3 aspect ratio and a 2560 x 1920 resolution. The Fold can be utilized in a variety of flexible ways thanks to its 17.3" display when completely opened and 12.5" each side when folded. The 12th Gen Intel Core i7-1250U 1.1 GHz (12M Cache, up to 4.7 GHz, 2P+8E cores) and 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM power the ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702. It offers the performance you require thanks to a 1TB M.2 NVMe PCIe Performance SSD. It features Intel Iris Xe Graphics incorporated inside it.
World's First 17-inch Foldable OLED Laptop
The ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702 has a revolutionary Foldable OLED touchscreen with a resolution of 2560 x 1920. The 4:3 OLED screen has all of the advantages, including a 0.2 ms response time, a refresh rate of 60 Hz, 1.07 billion colors, PANTONE Validation for realistic colors, and an ultra-vivid 100% DCI-P3 color gamut. Dolby Vision is supported by the VESA Certified DisplayHDR True Black 500 display for vivid HDR graphics. The screen also has TÜV Rheinland eye-care certification and has 70% lower blue light levels than a standard LCD panel. When folded, the display has a 12.5-inch diagonal display. Each side has a screen with a 1920 x 1280 resolution and a 3:2 aspect ratio. Because of the ZenBook Fold's innovative foldable hinge and OLED screen, this comes in handy while using it in different modes. In some configurations, one of the 12.5" screens can display a virtual onscreen keyboard, allowing you to use the ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED as a one-of-a-kind two-screen laptop.

Premium Design and High-tech Materials
Zenbook 17 Fold OLED redefines the idea of premium, from its distinctive color and high-tech materials to its breathtakingly exquisite finish. You'll never have to settle for less in a laptop because it has everything you need. When unfolded, the ultra-compact chassis is only 8.7 mm thick, made of magnesium alloy, and finished in Tech Black with an integrated dark green faux-leather ergonomic kickstand. The new ASUS monogram on dark blue glass catches the light in an intriguing way as you spin the laptop around.

A new hybrid of Laptop and Tablet
The ZenBook 17 Fold OLED's foldable OLED panel allows it to surpass the limits of a standard laptop. It can be used in Laptop Mode, Desktop Mode, Tablet Mode, E-Book Reader Mode, or Extended Mode. When fully unfolded in Tablet mode, the Fold provides full access to the 17.3" display, which includes intuitive touch controls. You can fold the screen slightly into Book mode for a more pleasant reading experience. You can use ScreenXpert features to display different content and apps on either side of the folded screen. The ZenBook 17 Fold OLED can be propped up in Desktop Mode thanks to the built-in leather kickstand. You can utilize the wireless ASUS ErogSense Bluetooth Keyboard. The ZenBook Fold retains some of its laptop heritage. When you fold the screen into a clamshell form, the keyboard magnetically snaps into place, giving you the sensation of a traditional clamshell laptop. You can also use an on-screen virtual keyboard instead of the keyboard if you want to.

Effortless Performance
The ZenBook 17 Fold OLED is powered by a 12-core Intel Core i7-1250U processor and 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM. Its performance cores may be overclocked to 4.7 GHz, while the efficiency cores do background operations. The graphics are handled by integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics. The ZenBook Fold has a 1TB M.2 NVMe PCIe 4.0 performance SSD for storage. The SSD delivers speedy boot and load speeds, letting you turn on the Fold and get into your apps immediately. Wi-Fi 6E uses the less congested 6 GHz band with compatible networks to deliver smooth video streaming and online gaming experiences.

Harman Kardon quad-speaker with Dolby Atmos
The powerful Harman Kardon-certified quad-speaker Dolby Atmos audio system on the ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702 provides immersive surround sound. It's powered by a clever amplifier that enhances volume while eliminating distortion, resulting in crystal-clear sound for entertainment or conversations. The dual-channel smart amplifier's volume-boosting, distortion-reducing DSP chip allows it to drive the twin speakers at maximum volume while preventing long-term harm to the sensitive speaker voice coils.
Next-level AI noise-canceling audio technology
ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED is equipped with ASUS AI noise-canceling technology to ensure the finest experience as remote work and video conferences increased. ASUS AI noise-canceling audio makes use of machine learning to separate undesirable noise from human speech. The MyASUS app's ClearVoice Mic feature can filter out ambient noise and normalize all individual voices in Multi-presenter mode from various positions for optimal group conference-call quality. The ClearVoice Speaker function eliminates all ambient noise except human speech, allowing you to hear what everyone else is saying.
ASUS ErgoSense Bluetooth Keyboard & Touchpad
The wireless ASUS ErgoSense Bluetooth Keyboard is included with the ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702. The keyboard's 19.05mm key pitch, 1.4mm key travel, and 0.2mm keycap dish give a comfortable yet precise typing experience. The keyboard connects wirelessly to the Fold through Bluetooth, allowing you to use it separately. When in Laptop mode, it magnetically links to the Fold, which immediately converts to a 12.5" screen for a typical clamshell laptop layout. The touchpad's smooth glide is intended to be soft.

Innovative Camera System
The ASUS ZenBook 17 Fold OLED UX9702's webcam makes it easy to participate in video calls, improving collaboration and productivity. You can have crystal-clear video calls with the ASUS 3D Noise Reduction (3DNR) technology on the 5MP AI webcam. To ensure that everything appears clear and crisp during video calls, the innovative technology does real-time de-noising and image sharpening. Additionally, the screen's brightness and color temperature are automatically adjusted by a color sensor in response to ambient light levels to deliver the best possible image. The Intel Visual Sensing Controller provides power to the HD infrared camera with AdaptiveLock. This artificial intelligence (AI)-powered technology detects when you step away from the laptop, locks it for security, and automatically logs you back in as soon as you are close to it. It also dims the screen when you glance away from it to conserve battery life.
Ports and Connectivity
The USB Type-C ports of the Zenbook 17 Fold OLED support the most recent Thunderbolt 4 technology, as well as Power Delivery and DisplayPort. Thunderbolt 4 interface uses the reversible USB Type-C connector and has a maximum speed of 40 Gb/s when utilized with compatible devices. The port also transmits data through USB4 at up to 20 Gb/s, and the dual-bandwidth DisplayPort allows you to connect a single 8K monitor or up to two 4K monitors at the same time. Furthermore, you may daisy link up to six devices from a single Thunderbolt 4 connector. A 3.5mm combo connector for headphones or an external microphone is provided for audio. The ZenBook 17 Fold OLED also has a power button and volume buttons on the sides.
Ultra-demanding MIL-STD 810H military standard
The Zenbook 17 Fold OLED satisfies the ultra-demanding MIL-STD 810H military standard for dependability and endurance, having gone through a grueling test regime that included extended tests for operation in hostile situations such as extreme altitudes, temperatures, and humidity. It also passes ASUS laptop tests that are considerably beyond industry standards. The revolutionary precision-engineered hinge is tested to at least 30,000-cycle torture test to ensure maximum longevity.

MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI Core i9 13th Gen 64GB RAM 4TB SSD RTX 4090 16GB Graphics 17.3" 4K UHD 144Hz Gaming Laptop
The MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI is a combination of sharp appearance and excellent performance. Equipped with an Intel Core i9-13900H (24M Cache, 2.6 GHz up to 5.4 GHz), 64GB of RAM, and a massive 4TB SSD, this laptop delivers lightning-fast performance for even the most demanding games. The 17.3" 4K UHD 144Hz display provides stunning visuals and smooth gameplay, while the RTX 4090 16GB graphics card ensures that you can run the latest games at maximum settings. The laptop also features a sleek design with a backlit keyboard, making it perfect for gaming on the go. This MSI Laptop comes with a thin and light black sand-blasted metal chassis and reinforced hinge. A bold and understated tone for gaming enthusiasts and tech elites.
Powered by NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Laptop GPU
The MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI is powered by the latest NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 16GB GDDR6 Graphics, which is the most powerful graphics card available for laptops. This GPU is built on the ultra-efficient NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture and delivers a quantum leap in performance with AI-powered DLSS 3 and full ray tracing capabilities. The RTX 4090 16GB graphics card allows you to experience lifelike virtual worlds, and run the latest games at maximum settings. The GPU is also equipped with the Max-Q suite of technologies that optimizes system performance, power, battery life, and acoustics for peak efficiency, making sure the machine runs at its best while gaming or doing creative work. The MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI is the perfect Gaming Laptop for gamers and creators who demand the best in graphics performance.
Mini LED 4K 144Hz Display
The MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI offers an immersive gaming experience with its ultra-high resolution Mini LED 4K display, which delivers exceptional realism and detail. The AmLED ACR technology ensures that colors remain vibrant and clear even in bright environments, while the DisplayHDR 1000 certification provides a wider color gamut. Additionally, the 144Hz refresh rate ensures fast and smooth gameplay.
More Storage and Memory
The MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI Core i9 13th Gen Gaming Laptop is designed for maximum performance and storage, featuring 64GB of DDR5 memory and 4TB SSD. This Core i9 laptop provides high-speed storage and ample space for all your gaming and media needs.
6x Speakers Sound System
The Stealth 17 Studio A13VI comes with a 6-speaker surround sound system with world-class Dynaudio. Equipped with two pairs of dual force-canceling speakers and a pair of tweeters to meet the highest acoustic expectations.
Per-Key RGB Gaming Keyboard by SteelSeries
MSI Stealth 17 Studio A13VI features a Per-Key RGB Gaming Keyboard by SteelSeries. The keyboard features a two-piece keycap structure and gold cross-point contact system to ensure the most crispy tactile and precise actuation in any session. The slim, sleek design of the keyboard adds to the overall aesthetics of the laptop. The keyboard is built to last, ensuring an exceptional typing experience for years to come.

Short_Description:
Asus ExpertBook B1 B1400CBA Core i5 12th Gen 14" FHD Laptop
The Asus ExpertBook B1 B1400CBA is a powerful and versatile laptop designed for professionals seeking a balance of performance and portability. With its sleek and modern design, this laptop is not only aesthetically appealing but also built to withstand the rigors of daily business use. Packed with a range of productivity features and reliable hardware, it caters to the needs of business users and individuals who demand efficiency and dependability in their computing devices. The Asus ExpertBook B1 B1400CBA is equipped with an Intel Core i5-1235U processor. This quad-core processor has a base clock speed of 3.30 GHz and can reach a maximum turbo frequency of 4.40 GHz. With its 12MB cache, the processor delivers smooth performance, making multitasking and handling demanding applications a breeze. To ensure smooth multitasking and efficient performance, the laptop comes with 8GB of DDR4 RAM. This memory capacity is sufficient for handling multiple applications simultaneously and running productivity tools, making it suitable for everyday office tasks and light content creation. Short_Description:
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 16GB RAM 256GB SSD 13" Multi-Touch Laptop for Business (QIM-00001)
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 for Business is great for traveling workers because to its mix of performance and mobility. The PixelSense 13" touchscreen has a high resolution and supports 10-point touch. Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) connectivity makes it simple to stay connected for emails and video conversations.
12th Gen Intel Core Performance
The 12th Generation Intel Core i7-1265U 10-Core CPU has performance cores that can be clocked up to 4.8 GHz to power demanding programs, while efficiency cores manage background activities and multitasking. The Surface Pro 9 also has 16GB of LPDDR5 RAM and 256GB of M.2 NVMe PCIe SSD storage. The Surface Pro 9 not only performs well, but it can also tackle your work with up to 15.5 hours of battery life on a single charge.
13" PixelSense Touchscreen
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i5 12th Gen 13" Multi-Touch Laptop features a virtually edge-to-edge 13" PixelSense touchscreen with Think Large. The display offers a high-quality experience with a 2880 x 1920 resolution at 267 ppi and a 3:2 aspect ratio. The display has a dynamic refresh rate of 120 Hz. The display supports Dolby Vision IQ and has a brightness of up to 450 nits. The screen supports 10-point touch, so you can use your fingers or a pen to interact with it. The built-in kickstand lets you choose the best viewing position for you.
Connectivity
Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) wireless connectivity allows you to stay connected while on the road. With usual use, the 13" Surface Pro 9 may get up to 15.5 hours of battery life on a single charge (this may vary depending on usage). You may use the Surface Pro 9 with a Surface Signature Keyboard (available separately) to simulate a typical laptop experience. Bluetooth 5.2 may also connect to other gadgets and devices.
Thunderbolt 4
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 13" Multi-Touch Laptop offers Thunderbolt 4, which is a hardware interface that uses the reversible USB Type-C connection and has a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s when utilized with compatible devices. The port also delivers data through USB4 at up to 20 Gb/s, and the dual-bandwidth DisplayPort allows you to connect either one 8K monitor or up to two 4K monitors at the same time. In addition, you may daisy link up to six devices from a single port.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Air (2023) Apple M2 Chip 15-Inch Liquid Retina Display 8GB RAM 256GB SSD Silver
The Apple MacBook Air 15.3-Inch laptop is powered by the new M2 chip. It is loaded with 8GB RAM and 256GB SSD. The MacBook Air features a brilliant Retina display, a FaceTime HD camera, and studio‑quality mics. It comes with the same compact design but now it supports up to 20 hours of battery life and an active cooling system to sustain enhanced performance. macOS and M2 work together to bring more speed and responsiveness to all your go‑to apps. The Apple MacBook Air comes with active cooling that sustains blazing‑fast performance.
Level up with the New M2 Chip
The Apple M2 chip is an 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. It comes with 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, and 100GB/s memory bandwidth for superfluid multitasking and working with massive files. The M2 is built using an enhanced second-generation 5‑nanometer technology. It features over 20 billion transistors - 25 percent more than M1. And its 16-core Neural Engine is capable of executing up to 15.8 trillion operations per second to accelerate machine learning tasks. The high-performance media engine on M2 supports ProRes encode and decode. So you can play and edit up to 11 streams of 4K ProRes video and up to 2 streams of 8K ProRes video.
Retina display supports millions of colors
The Apple MacBook Air 15-Inch comes with a brilliant 15.3-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2880 x 1864 native resolution at 224 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors. It takes images on an incredible level of detail and realism. The bright LED backlighting delivers deep blacks and bright whites. It features 500 nits brightness, Wide color (P3), and True Tone technology.
Camera and mics
The Apple MacBook Air 15.3-Inch is equipped with a FaceTime HD camera and a Three-mic array. With the advanced image signal processor on M2, you’ll look your best on video calls. The microphones deliver an improved signal‑to‑noise ratio that rivals that of professional‑grade microphones.
Magic Keyboard and the Touch ID
The Apple MacBook Air comes with a Magic Keyboard that delivers a comfortable, quiet, and responsive typing experience. The Touch Bar puts the commands you need most right where you need them, saving time and keystrokes. You can do all kinds of things quicker with handy shortcuts and features. And Touch ID provides fast, easy authentication for secure logins and purchases.

Short_Description:
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 13" Multi-Touch Laptop
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 comes with Intel Core i7-1255U (12M Cache, 3.50 GHz, up to 4.70 GHz) and 32GB LPDDR5 RAM. This 2-in-1 laptop offers 1TB SSD for storage capacity. The Surface Pro 9 combines the power of a laptop with the versatility of a tablet. It features a 13" 2880 x 1920 resolution PixelSense Flow touchscreen display, dual Thunderbolt 4 ports, and a convenient built-in kickstand.
13-inch PixelSense Flow Display
Surface Pro 9 has a 13" edge-to-edge PixelSense Flow 10-point touchscreen display with a 2880 x 1920 resolution. The display also supports cinema-quality video with Dolby Vision IQ and comes with an ambient color sensor, which automatically adjusts the color temperature and brightness based on the lighting conditions. It can deliver up to 120Hz refresh rate.
Faster Connectivity
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 offers Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) connectivity which allows you to take advantage of the less congested 6 GHz band with compatible networks, delivering a clear high-speed signal for smooth video streaming, online gaming, and web browsing experiences.
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 comes with a 1-year warranty.

Short_Description:
HP EliteBook 830 G8 Core i7 11th Gen 13.3" FHD Laptop with 03 Years Warranty
The HP EliteBook 830 G8 comes equipped with an Intel Core i7-1185G7 (12M Cache, up to 4.80 GHz) processor with Intel Iris Xe graphics. It has 16GB of RAM and a 1TB NVMe SSD. This laptop features a 13.3" anti-glare IPS Full HD display with a native resolution of 1920 x 1080, LED backlighting, a 16:9 aspect ratio, 250 cd/m2 brightness, a typical contrast ratio of 600:1, and a refresh rate of 60 Hz. The display covers 45% of the NTSC color gamut and offers a sharp and clear picture. It also supports video output to external displays through Thunderbolt 4 and HDMI 2.0b outputs. The integrated Intel Iris Xe Graphics ensures excellent visual performance. The laptop includes a 720p IR webcam with an integrated privacy shutter and face-detection security. Connectivity options include 2 x Thunderbolt 4 with USB4 Type-C offering a 40Gbps signaling rate (supporting USB Power Delivery and DisplayPort 1.4), 2 x SuperSpeed USB Type-A with a 5Gbps signaling rate (one supporting charging), 1 x HDMI 2.0b, and 1 x Stereo headphone/microphone combo jack. For wireless networking, Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax) is built-in, and Bluetooth 5.0 technology allows easy connection to compatible peripherals. The latest HP EliteBook 830 G8 Laptop has 03 years Limited Warranty.

Short_Description:
Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Celeron N4020 14" FHD Laptop
The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i is a lightweight and stylish laptop with a 14-inch FHD LED display and a 1920 x 1080 resolution, making it ideal for comfortable and clear viewing. The laptop is powered by an Intel Celeron N4020 CPU with 4M cache and a maximum speed of 2.80 GHz. It also includes 4GB DDR4 RAM and a 256GB SSD for quick and efficient storage. In terms of connectivity, the Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i comes with WiFi and Bluetooth 5.0, as well as a variety of ports including one USB 2.0 Type-A port, two USB 3.1 Gen 1 Type-A ports, an HDMI port, and a combo headphone and microphone port. It also has an SD card reader for multimedia card support.The laptop has integrated Intel UHD 600 Graphics and shared graphics memory access, making it ideal for general use and light gaming. Stereo speakers with 1.5W x2 output and Dolby Audio technology are included, as is a built-in HD camera for video conferencing. The laptop runs on Windows 11 Home and weighs just 1.7Kg, with dimensions of 359.2 x 236.5 x 19.9mm, making it a great choice for those who need a reliable and portable device for everyday use.

Xiaomi RedmiBook 15 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6" FHD Laptop

The Power Adapter is 65Watt. The used material is Polycarbonate with a brushed metallic finish. The dimension of this laptop is 19.9 x 363.8 x 243.5 mm. the Weight of this laptop is 1.8 kg. Short_Description:
Realme Book Core i3 11th Gen 256GB SSD 14" 2k UHD Laptop
The Realme Book features an 11th Gen Intel Core Processor. It comes with Intel Core i3-1115G4 Processor (6MB Cache, 3.0 GHz up to 4.10 GHz). It offers a huge performance boost with remarkable speed. It has an advanced cooling system featuring dual 8 mm-diameter heat pipes, dual ultra-thin, high-speed, and high-airflow fans, and an efficient wing-shaped design that maximizes the entire machine's cooling capacity, enabling breakneck performance. It comes equipped with an 8GB Dual channel 3733MHz LPDDR4x RAM and 256GB PCIe SSD which allows for seamless multitasking. SSD provides enough space to manage and transfer files with greater speed and efficiency. It has 3100MB/s & 1800MB/s Read and write speeds. It is integrated with Intel UHD graphics and it delivers a high-performance boost.
2K Full Vision Display with 14.9 Super Slim Design
The Realme Book comes with a 2K Ultra-HD screen that delivers stellar image quality with sharp detail. Razor-thin bezels allow a 90% screen-to-body ratio for an immersive viewing experience. A 3:2 aspect ratio allows the more vertical content display to maximize your productivity. The display brightness of up to 400 nits maintains high image quality outdoors. 100% sRGB wide color gamut enables full-spectrum color for true-to-life visuals. It has a sleek aluminum build that is achieved through precision-crafted for an effortlessly stylish exterior that matches an exceptionally powerful interior. It is just 1.38 kg light and 14.9 mm thin to maximize portability without compromising on durability.
Dual HARMAN audio speakers system with Stereo Surround Sound By DTS
Realme Book features Stereo Surround Sound By DTS and is equipped with a Dual HARMAN audio speakers system that delivers highly immersive audio experiences. Stereo Surround Sound enables you to fully enjoy the dramatic all-around cinema-like sound without distortion.
Next Level of Connectivity
This Laptop is equipped with Wi-Fi 5. It has 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz and 2 x 2 MIMO. It also has Bluetooth 5.1. This Realme Book has been designed with USB-C 3.2 Ã— 2 Gen 2, USB-A 3.1 Gen 1, and 3.5mm Headphone and Microphone Jack. It comes with Cross-Device Integration. PC Connect allows you to seamlessly connect your devices, so you can access files of smartphones instantly and drag and drop them between different screens with ease.
Backlit Keyboard and Extra-Large touchpad
Realme Book has a 3-level Backlit Keyboard with a 1.3mm Key Travel, X-shape Bracket, Smile Arc. It also has a 123.8 Ã— 78.2mm Large Multi-touch Trackpad that supports Microsoft PTP Clickpad Technology. It especially comes with a 2-in-1 Fingerprint Function that is capable of One-touch start-up and unlocking. It also has an In-built 720P HD Camera that features dual microphones that come with Vocplus AI-powered noise-reduction technology.
Fast Charge Your Device
The laptop is powered by a 54 Wh battery and it comes with a 65W fast charger that gets you to a 50% charge in just 30 minutes. It also supports up to 30W Dart flash charging for smartphones with a USB-C port, so you can keep your mobile devices powered while you're on the go.
The Realme Book Core i3 Laptop comes with a 1-year warranty.

Short_Description:
ASUS ExpertBook P1 P1412CEA Core i5 11th Gen 14" FHD Laptop
The ASUS ExpertBook P1 P1412CEA is powered by Intel Intel Core i5-1135G7 Processor (8M Cache, 2.40 GHz up to 4.20 GHz) with Intel Iris Xe Graphics. This processor delivers the fast and responsive performance you need, with a dual-storage design that provides ample storage space and faster data access. ExpertBook P1 is future-proof as well, with an easy-access design that makes it easy to upgrade internal components. This lightweight laptop pairs military-grade robustness with corporate-level security, and features the new SensePoint pointing nub. This Laptop features a slim bezel NanoEdge display that provides a more usable onscreen workspace in a smaller frame, essentially fitting a 14" FHD display. The ExpertBook P1 offers a comprehensive set of I/O ports for easy data transfers and versatile peripheral connections. To ensure reliability, ports are tested to endure up to 15,000 insertions.
Dual-storage Design
ASUS ExpertBook P1 P1412CEA has a dual-storage design to give you the benefits of superfast data performance and a large storage capacity. You can install apps on the SSD for quicker response and loading times, and use the HDD to store large files such as movies, music libraries, and photo albums. It also features E-A-R HDD shock dampening to protect your data from everyday bumps, while its reinforced chassis improves both typing comfort and allows you to open and close the lid in one smooth motion.
Constantly connected
ASUS ExpertBook P1 P1412CEA is equipped with 1 x Type-C USB 3.2 (Gen 2) with display and power delivery support. 2 x Type-A USB 3.2 (Gen 1), 1 x Type-A USB2.0, 1 x HDMI and 1 x COMBO audio jack. Its chassis design incorporates features that provide extra structural rigidity to cope with the rigors of everyday use.

Short_Description:
MSI Modern 14 C12M Core i5 12th Gen 14" FHD Laptop
The MSI Modern 14 C12M Laptop showcases an Intel Core i5-1235U Processor (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz) and 16GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM integrated onboard. The Intel Core i5-1235U belongs to the mid-range category of mobile CPUs designed for slim and lightweight laptops, leveraging the Alder Lake architecture. It offers 2 performance cores (P-cores) based on the Golden Cove architecture and 8 efficient cores (E-cores) based on the Gracemont architecture. The P-cores support Hyper-Threading, resulting in a total of 12 supported threads when combined with the E-cores. The clock speed varies between 1.3 and 4.4 GHz for the performance cluster and 0.9 to 3.3 GHz for the efficient cluster. The laptop is equipped with a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen3x4 SSD. It also features Intel Iris Xe Graphics and a 14" FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS LED Display. The integrated graphics card is built on the Xe architecture and operates with 80 out of 96 EUs (Execution Units), functioning at speeds of up to 1.2 GHz. Powering the laptop is a 39.3Whr battery, accompanied by a 65 W adapter. Other notable specifications include an HD type (30fps@720p) WebCam and a Backlight (Single-Color, White) keyboard. The laptop is equipped with 802.11 axes Wi-Fi 6 + Bluetooth v5.2. In terms of connectivity, it offers 2x Type-A USB2.0 ports, 1x Micro SD Card Reader, 1x (4K @ 30Hz) HDMI port, 1x Type-A USB3.2 Gen2 port, and 1x Type-C USB3.2 Gen2 port with PD charging support. The laptop's design features an ultra-light and ultra-slim aluminum chassis, weighing only 1.4kg and measuring 16.9mm in thickness. The Modern Series combines portability and style, making it ideal for your fast-paced lifestyle.

MSI Modern 14 C12M Core i5 12th Gen 14" FHD Laptop
The MSI Modern 14 C12M Laptop features Intel Core i5-1235U Processor (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz) and 8GB DDR4 3200MHz RAM onboard. The Intel Core i5-1235U is a mid-range mobile CPU for thin and light laptops based on the Alder Lake architecture and it offers 2 performance cores (P-cores, Golden Cove architecture) and 8 efficient cores (E-cores, Gracemont architecture). The P-cores support Hyper-Threading leading to 12 supported threads when combined with the E-cores. The clock rate ranges from 1.3 to 4.4 GHz on the performance cluster and 0.9 to 3.3 GHz on the efficient cluster. It comes with a 512GB NVMe PCIe Gen3x4 SSD. This laptop has been Intel Iris Xe Graphics and has a 14" FHD (1920 x 1080) IPS LED Display. The integrated graphics card is based on the Xe-architecture and offers 80 of the 96 EUs (Execution Units) operating at up to 1.2 GHz. This laptop is powered by a 39.3Whr battery and comes with a 65 W adapter. It features an HD type (30fps@720p) WebCam and Backlight (Single-Color, White) keyboard. It has been equipped with 802.11 ax Wi-Fi 6 + Bluetooth v5.2. The laptop has been designed with 2x Type-A USB2.0, 1x Micro SD Card Reader, 1x (4K @ 30Hz) HDMI, 1x Type-A USB3.2 Gen2 and 1x Type-C USB3.2 Gen2 with PD charging. It has been crafted in a 1.4kg ultra-light and ultra-slim 16.9 mm aluminum chassis, the Modern Series is made portable and stylish wherever you go. The laptop offers Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.0 connectivity, providing fast and reliable wireless performance. The Samsung Galaxy Book2 360 is a 2 in 1 Laptop powered by an Intel Core i5-1235U processor of the 12th generation, with a frequency of 3.30 GHz (up to 4.40 GHz), 10 cores (2 performance cores, 8 efficient cores), and 12 threads, it delivers excellent performance. Epic performance

Seamless video calls anywhere at any time
The Galaxy Book2 360's Studio mode and Intelligent Noise Cancelling. Studio mode offers auto framing and various background effects to eliminate distractions, while the dual array microphone provides intelligent noise cancellation for clear audio.
Compact and powerful

Wide range of convenient port options
The Samsung Galaxy Book2 360 offers a wide range of port options. From USB 3.2 ports to Thunderbolt 4, HDMI, and more, you can easily connect your peripherals and expand the capabilities of your laptop.
Galaxy Ecosystem
The Galaxy Book2 360 seamlessly integrates with the Galaxy Ecosystem, providing a connected and cohesive user experience. Connect your laptop with other Galaxy devices such as smartphones, tablets, and smartwatches to streamline your digital life.

Apple MacBook Air 13.3-Inch Retina Display 8-core Apple M1 Chip 16GB RAM 256GB SSD Space Gray (Z124000AL)
The Apple MacBook Air 13.3-Inch is Apple's thinnest, lightest notebook, completely transformed by the Apple M1 chip. It comes with 16GB of RAM and 256GB SSD. The CPU speeds up to 3.5x faster and the GPU speeds up to 5x faster. It comes with the most advanced Neural Engine for up to 9x faster machine learning. The longest battery life ever in a MacBook Air. And a silent, fanless design. This much power has never been this ready to go. Our first chip was designed specifically for Mac. Packed with an astonishing 16 billion transistors, the Apple M1 system on a chip (SoC) integrates the CPU, GPU, Neural Engine, I/O, and so much more onto a single tiny chip. M1 features the world's fastest integrated graphics on a personal computer.8 That's up to 5x faster graphics performance compared with the previous generation.
Lifelike colors with Retina Display
Incredible graphics performance MacBook Air can take on more graphics-intensive projects than ever. For the first time, content creators can edit and seamlessly play back multiple streams of full-quality 4K video without dropping a frame. It delivers detail and realism on the brilliant 13.3‑inch, 2560‑by‑1600-resolution Retina display. Thanks to True Tone Technology, MacBook Air automatically adjusts the white point of your display to the color temperature of your environment for a more natural viewing experience.
HD Camera and mics
The Apple MacBook Air comes with an HD FaceTime camera and Three mics. It offers face detection and uses the Neural Engine to adjust white balance and exposure for even more natural‑looking skin tones. The mics pick up your voice clearly and reduce the noise around you.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Air (2022) Apple M2 Chip 13.6-Inch Liquid Retina Display 8GB RAM 256GB SSD Starlight #MLY13LL/A / MLY13ZP/A
The Apple MacBook Air 13.6-Inch laptop is powered by the new M2 chip. It is loaded with 8GB RAM and 256GB SSD. The MacBook Air features a brilliant Retina display, a FaceTime HD camera, and studio‑quality mics. It comes with the same compact design but now it supports up to 20 hours of battery life and an active cooling system to sustain enhanced performance. macOS and M2 work together to bring more speed and responsiveness to all your go‑to apps. The Apple MacBook Air comes with active cooling that sustains blazing‑fast performance.
Level up with the New M2 Chip
The Apple M2 chip is an 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. It comes with 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, and 100GB/s memory bandwidth for superfluid multitasking and working with massive files. The M2 is built using an enhanced second-generation 5‑nanometer technology. It features over 20 billion transistors - 25 percent more than M1. And its 16-core Neural Engine is capable of executing up to 15.8 trillion operations per second to accelerate machine learning tasks. The high-performance media engine on M2 supports ProRes encode and decode. So you can play and edit up to 11 streams of 4K ProRes video and up to 2 streams of 8K ProRes video.
Retina display supports millions of colors
The Apple MacBook Air 13.6-Inch comes with a brilliant 13.6-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2560-by-1664 native resolution at 224 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors. It takes images on an incredible level of detail and realism. The bright LED backlighting delivers deep blacks and bright whites. It features 500 nits brightness, Wide color (P3), and True Tone technology.
Camera and mics
The Apple MacBook Air 13.6-Inch is equipped with a FaceTime HD camera and a Three-mic array. With the advanced image signal processor on M2, you’ll look your best on video calls. The microphones deliver an improved signal‑to‑noise ratio that rivals that of professional‑grade microphones.
Magic Keyboard and the Touch ID
The Apple MacBook Air comes with a Magic Keyboard that delivers a comfortable, quiet, and responsive typing experience. The Touch Bar puts the commands you need most right where you need them, saving time and keystrokes. You can do all kinds of things quicker with handy shortcuts and features. And Touch ID provides fast, easy authentication for secure logins and purchases.
The Apple MacBook Air 13.6-Inch comes with a 1-year International Limited Warranty (Terms & Condition Apply As Per Apple)

Asus ROG Strix G15 G513IE AMD Ryzen 7 4800H RTX 3050Ti 4GB Graphics 15.6" FHD Gaming Laptop
The Asus ROG Strix G15 G513IE is a high-performance gaming laptop designed for immersive gaming experiences. It is equipped with powerful hardware and advanced features to deliver exceptional performance. At the heart of this laptop is the AMD Ryzen 7 4800H processor, a high-performance CPU with 8 cores and 16 threads. With a base clock speed of 2.9 GHz and a boost clock speed of up to 4.2 GHz, this processor provides excellent multitasking capabilities and smooth gameplay. This laptop is its graphics capabilities. It is equipped with an NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3050Ti graphics card with 4GB of dedicated memory. The Asus ROG Strix G15 G513IE features a 15.6" Full HD display, which delivers vibrant colors and sharp details. The laptop also includes a backlit chiclet keyboard with 4-zone RGB lighting, allowing users to customize the keyboard illumination to their preference. The inclusion of a Type-C port provides convenient connectivity options, while the presence of three USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A ports and one USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C port ensures compatibility with a wide range of peripherals. The Asus ROG Strix G15 G513IE is a powerful gaming laptop that combines a high-performance processor, ample RAM and storage, and a dedicated graphics card to provide an exceptional gaming experience. Its sleek design and advanced features make it an attractive choice for gamers looking for both style and performance.

The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 comes with Intel Core i5-1235U (12M Cache, 1.30 GHz, up to 4.40 GHz) and 8GB LPDDR5 RAM. This 2-in-1 laptop offers 256GB SSD for storage capacity. Faster Connectivity
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 offers Wi-Fi 6E (802.11ax) connectivity which allows you to take advantage of the less congested 6 GHz band with compatible networks, delivering a clear high-speed signal for smooth video streaming, online gaming, and web browsing experiences.
