Short_Description:
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 16GB RAM 256GB SSD 13" Multi-Touch Laptop (QIL-00018)
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 13" Laptop, which combines the strength of a laptop with the adaptability of a tablet, lets you be creative, productive, and entertained from practically anywhere. This portable graphite-colored system is updated with an Intel i7 10-core processor and 16GB of LPDDR5 memory, giving it the flexibility to swiftly multitask applications like Microsoft Word, Adobe Fresco, and more installed onto its replaceable 256GB SSD. It is designed for everyday productivity, video conferencing, and gaming. A 13" PixelSense Flow touchscreen display with a resolution of 2880 x 1920, two Thunderbolt 4 connections, and a practical built-in kickstand are all features of the Surface Pro 9, which keeps the same familiar, lightweight style as its predecessor. You can join compatible high-speed networks using Wi-Fi 6E's connectivity features.
12th Gen Intel Core 10-Core Processor
This Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Laptop is equipped with an energy-efficient Intel Core i7-1255U 10-core 12th generation processor. It has two Performance cores with a Max Turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz to load a variety of applications, while the eight Efficient cores handle background tasks for seamless multitasking.
PixelSense Flow Display
The 13" PixelSense Flow 10-point touchscreen display on the Microsoft Surface Pro 9 laptop has a 2880 x 1920 resolution and 267 ppi (pixels per inch), producing clear images with a 3:2 aspect ratio. Along with Dolby Vision IQ support for cinematic film, the display has an ambient color sensor that automatically adjusts brightness and color temperature according on the ambient illumination. By increasing the refresh rate from the standard 60 Hz to 120 Hz, you may minimize motion blur while playing your favorite games and navigate across web pages more smoothly.
Thunderbolt 4
Thunderbolt 4 is a physical interface with a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s that makes use of the reversible USB Type-C connector. Microsoft Surface Pro 9 comes with dual-bandwidth DisplayPort, you may connect either one 8K monitor or as many as two 4K monitors at once. The connector can also send data via USB4 at up to 20 Gb/s. A single connection also allows you to daisy link up to six devices.
Complete Your Experience
Enhance your Surface Pro 9 with a separately purchased Surface Slim Pen 2 to make detailed illustrations and edits as though you were working with a pen and paper. Adding a Surface Pro Signature Keyboard provides you with a laptop experience. You can also pair the system with a variety of Bluetooth devices, including headsets, mice, and speakers.
Microsoft Teams Integration
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 lets you stay in touch with your friends, family, coworkers, and clients. Whether they are using Windows, Android, or iOS devices, you may connect to your contacts with a touch and communicate with them via text, audio, or video. Two-way SMS texting is another option for contacting those who don't have the Teams app installed.
Redesigned Microsoft Store
With Microsoft Surface Pro 9 you get a registered Microsoft Store. For a more streamlined experience when looking for content including apps, games, movies, and shows, the Microsoft Store has been completely revamped. Family safety and security have been examined in the Store-available apps. Android apps can be utilized directly on your PC from the taskbar or Start Menu and will also be accessible through the Amazon Appstore on the Microsoft Store.

Short_Description:
Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch Retina Display M2 Chip 8GB RAM 512GB SSD Silver (MNEQ3)
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch laptop is powered by the new M2 chip. It is loaded with 8GB RAM and 512GB SSD. The MacBook Pro 13.3 inch laptop features a brilliant Retina display, a FaceTime HD camera, and studio‑quality mics. It comes with the same compact design but now it supports an active cooling system to sustain enhanced performance. macOS and M2 work together to bring more speed and responsiveness to all your go‑to apps. The Apple MacBook Pro comes with active cooling that sustains blazing‑fast performance.
Level up with the New M2 Chip
The Apple M2 chip is an 8-core CPU with 4 performance cores and 4 efficiency cores. It is built using an enhanced second-generation 5‑nanometer technology. It comes with 10-core GPU, 16-core Neural Engine, and 100GB/s memory bandwidth for superfluid multitasking and working with massive files. The M2 features over 20 billion transistors - 25 percent more than M1. And its 16-core Neural Engine is capable of executing up to 15.8 trillion operations per second to accelerate machine learning tasks. The high-performance media engine on M2 supports ProRes encode and decode. So you can play and edit up to 11 streams of 4K ProRes video and up to 2 streams of 8K ProRes video.
Retina display supports millions of colors
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch comes with a brilliant 13.3-inch (diagonal) LED-backlit display with IPS technology; 2560-by-1600 native resolution at 227 pixels per inch with support for millions of colors. The bright LED backlighting delivers deep blacks and bright whites. It features 500 nits brightness, Wide color (P3), and True Tone technology.
Camera and mics
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch is equipped with a FaceTime HD camera and a Three-mic array. With the advanced image signal processor on M2, you’ll look your best on video calls. The microphones deliver an improved signal‑to‑noise ratio that rivals that of professional‑grade microphones.
Magic Keyboard and the Touch Bar
The Apple MacBook Pro comes with a Magic Keyboard that delivers a comfortable, quiet, and responsive typing experience. The Touch Bar puts the commands you need most right where you need them, saving time and keystrokes. You can do all kinds of things quicker with handy shortcuts and features. And Touch ID provides fast, easy authentication for secure logins and purchases.
The Apple MacBook Pro 13.3-Inch comes with a 1-year International Limited Warranty (Terms & Condition Apply As Per Apple)

Short_Description:
Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 16GB RAM 512GB SSD 13" Multi-Touch Laptop (QIX-00018)
The Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Core i7 12th Gen 13" Laptop, which combines the strength of a laptop with the adaptability of a tablet, lets you be creative, productive, and entertained from practically anywhere. This portable graphite-colored system is updated with an Intel i7 10-core processor and 16GB of LPDDR5 memory, giving it the flexibility to swiftly multitask applications like Microsoft Word, Adobe Fresco, and more installed onto its replaceable 512GB SSD. It is designed for everyday productivity, video conferencing, and gaming. A 13" PixelSense Flow touchscreen display with a resolution of 2880 x 1920, two Thunderbolt 4 connections, and a practical built-in kickstand are all features of the Surface Pro 9, which keeps the same familiar, lightweight style as its predecessor. You can join compatible high-speed networks using Wi-Fi 6E's connectivity features.
12th Gen Intel Core 10-Core Processor
This Microsoft Surface Pro 9 Laptop is equipped with an energy-efficient Intel Core i7-1255U 10-core 12th generation processor. It has two Performance cores with a Max Turbo frequency of 4.7 GHz to load a variety of applications, while the eight Efficient cores handle background tasks for seamless multitasking.
PixelSense Flow Display
The 13" PixelSense Flow 10-point touchscreen display on the Microsoft Surface Pro 9 laptop has a 2880 x 1920 resolution and 267 ppi (pixels per inch), producing clear images with a 3:2 aspect ratio. Along with Dolby Vision IQ support for cinematic film, the display has an ambient color sensor that automatically adjusts brightness and color temperature according on the ambient illumination. By increasing the refresh rate from the standard 60 Hz to 120 Hz, you may minimize motion blur while playing your favorite games and navigate across web pages more smoothly.
Thunderbolt 4
When utilized with compatible devices, Thunderbolt 4 is a physical interface with a maximum throughput of 40 Gb/s that makes use of the reversible USB Type-C connector. With dual-bandwidth DisplayPort, you may connect either one 8K monitor or as many as two 4K monitors at once. The connector can also send data via USB4 at up to 20 Gb/s. A single connection also allows you to daisy link up to six devices.
Complete Your Experience
Enhance your Surface Pro 9 with a separately purchased Surface Slim Pen 2 to make detailed illustrations and edits as though you were working with a pen and paper. Adding a Surface Pro Signature Keyboard provides you with a laptop experience. You can also pair the system with a variety of Bluetooth devices, including headsets, mice, and speakers.
Microsoft Teams Integration
Utilize Microsoft Teams Chat, which is incorporated into the taskbar of Windows 11, to stay in touch with your friends, family, coworkers, and clients. Whether they are using Windows, Android, or iOS devices, you may connect to your contacts with a touch and communicate with them via text, audio, or video. Two-way SMS texting is another option for contacting those who don't have the Teams app installed.
Redesigned Microsoft Store
For a more streamlined experience when looking for content including apps, games, movies, and shows, the Microsoft Store has been completely revamped. Family safety and security have been examined in the Store-available apps. Android apps can be utilized directly on your PC from the taskbar or Start Menu and will also be accessible through the Amazon Appstore on the Microsoft Store.

The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI is a powerful gaming laptop that boasts top-of-the-line specifications for an unparalleled gaming experience. Equipped with an Intel Core i9-13980HX (36M Cache, 2.2 GHz up to 5.60 GHz), 64GB of RAM, and a massive 4TB SSD, this laptop delivers lightning-fast performance for even the most demanding games. The 17.3" 4K UHD 144Hz display provides stunning visuals and smooth gameplay, while the RTX 4090 16GB graphics card ensures that you can run the latest games at maximum settings. The laptop also features a sleek design with a backlit keyboard, making it perfect for gaming on the go. This MSI Laptop is an excellent choice for gamers who demand the best in performance and graphics.
Powered by NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Laptop GPU
The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI is powered by the latest NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 16GB GDDR6 Graphics, which is the most powerful graphics card available for laptops. This GPU is built on the ultra-efficient NVIDIA Ada Lovelace architecture and delivers a quantum leap in performance with AI-powered DLSS 3 and full ray tracing capabilities. The RTX 4090 16GB graphics card allows you to experience lifelike virtual worlds, and run the latest games at maximum settings. The GPU is also equipped with the Max-Q suite of technologies that optimizes system performance, power, battery life, and acoustics for peak efficiency, making sure the machine runs at its best while gaming or doing creative work. The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI is the perfect Gaming Laptop for gamers and creators who demand the best in graphics performance.
Mini LED 4K 144Hz Display
The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI offers an immersive gaming experience with its ultra-high resolution Mini LED 4K display, which delivers exceptional realism and detail. The AmLED ACR technology ensures that colors remain vibrant and clear even in bright environments, while the DisplayHDR 1000 certification provides a wider color gamut. Additionally, the 144Hz refresh rate ensures fast and smooth gameplay. Upgrade your gaming experience and become a Titan with the MSI Titan GT77HX.
More Storage. More Memory. More Expansion
The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI Core i9 13th Gen Gaming Laptop is designed for maximum performance and storage, featuring 4 expansion memory slots for DDR5 memory, allowing you to upgrade to a massive 128GB of RAM. This Core i9 laptop has 3 M.2 SSD slots, including 1 PCIe Gen5 and 2 PCIe Gen4, providing high-speed storage and ample space for all your gaming and media needs. Despite its powerful hardware, the GT77HX is incredibly thin and lightweight, making it easy to take on-the-go. With its efficient design, the Titan GT77 HX is the perfect choice for gamers who demand the best in performance and portability.
Cherry MX Ultra Low Profile Mechanical Keyboard
MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI features Cherry Mechanical Per-Key RGB Gaming Keyboard by SteelSeries. The keyboard features a two-piece keycap structure and gold cross-point contact system to ensure the most crispy tactile and precise actuation in any session. The slim, sleek design of the keyboard adds to the overall aesthetics of the laptop. The keyboard is built to last, ensuring an exceptional typing experience for years to come.
Desktop-level IO Port
The MSI Titan GT77HX 13VI is designed to offer a wide range of connectivity options for all your gaming and work needs. It comes equipped with multiple ports for a variety of devices. It is equipped with 1x Type-C (USB / DP / Thunderbolt 4) with PD charging, 1x Type-C (USB / DP / Thunderbolt 4), 3x Type-A USB3.2 Gen2, 1x SD Express Card Reader, 1x (8K @ 60Hz / 4K @ 120Hz) HDMI, 1x Mini-DisplayPort and 1x RJ45.
